settings.option_description: Heel heights are measured from the high point where the heel joins the shoe, right to the floor.
Shoe heights are measured from the top point of the shoe, right to the floor.
Thigh Circumference is measured from the very top opening of a long boot.
settings.option_description_two: Calf Width is measured from the widest part of the calf on a long boot.

settings.option_description: Thigh Circumference is measured from the very top opening of a long boot.
Calf Width is measured from the widest part of the calf on a long boot.

settings.faq_title: What cards can I use to place an order?
settings.faq_content: We accept all major credit and debit cards. We also accept payment via PayPal and Payments by Amazon.

settings.faq_title: Do you accept PayPal?
settings.faq_content: Yes, we accept payment via PayPal.

settings.faq_title: Is my payment information safe?
settings.faq_content: Payment information is processed securely by accredited third parties such as PayPal, Amazon and Stripe. No payment information is transferred to or held by Public Desire Limited. All transactions take place via connections secured with the latest industry standard security protocols.

settings.faq_title: What currencies do you accept?
settings.faq_content: We accept payments in Pounds Sterling, US Dollars, Euros and Australian Dollars.

settings.faq_title: Why has my payment failed?
settings.faq_content: Your order will only be confirmed if the payment has been successfully processed. If you have entered incorrect card details, please try again and double check the information you are inputting. Please contact us if you would like assistance in placing your order.

settings.faq_title: What are my delivery options to the US?
settings.faq_content: We have two options for US delivery. Tracked delivery is $9.95 and takes 6-8 working days. Express delivery which is $14.95 and delivered within 2 working days using Fedex.

settings.faq_title: I have not received my order, what should I do?
settings.faq_content: You can check your tracking information in the email we have sent to you confirming your order has been shipped. If you cannot find your tracking details please email us on support@publicdesire.co.uk where our team will be happy to help.

settings.faq_title: Do you deliver to work addresses?
settings.faq_content: Yes, we deliver to work addresses. When you are in checkout, please enter your work address in the Shipping Details section.

settings.faq_title: Do you deliver to BFPO?
settings.faq_content: Yes, we deliver to BFPO addresses. When you are in checkout, please enter the appropriate address in the Shipping Details section.

settings.faq_title: My tracking shows as delivered, but I have not received my order?
settings.faq_content: If the tracking is showing as delivered but you have not received your order, please in the first instance, check with members of your household, neighbours or a safe place. If you have still not received your order, we will need to contact the courier on your behalf. Please email us on support@publicdesire.co.uk with your name, order number, address details and we can then look into this for you.

settings.faq_title: My item has been returned to you as 'undelivered'
settings.faq_content: Our couriers attempt to deliver twice before returning items back to us as undelivered. However, these will be automatically refunded once received.

settings.faq_title: Which countries do you deliver to?
settings.faq_content: You can find the current list of countries we can deliver to on our delivery page

settings.faq_title: How long do I have to return an item?
settings.faq_content: You can return your item within 60 days provided the product is in its original, unused condition.

settings.faq_title: How do I return an item?
settings.faq_content: Please follow the instructions displayed on our Returns page.

settings.faq_title: Can I send my item back for an exchange?
settings.faq_content: Unfortunately, we are no longer able to offer exchanges. If you require an alternative item, we recommend returning your unwanted shoes to us and placing a new order.

settings.faq_title: How long does it take to process my return?
settings.faq_content: Please allow up to 10 working days for your return to be processed and an additional 5 working days for the refund to show in your account.

settings.faq_title: I have lost my returns form, can I still return my item?
settings.faq_content: If you do not have a returns form, you can include a note with your return. This must have your Full name, address, email address, order number and reason for return. If you do not include a cover note, we will be unable to process your return until you contact us via email.

settings.faq_title: I have received a faulty item
settings.faq_content: We are very sorry to hear about this, please can you send an email to our help team with your name, address, order number and a picture of your item and our team will be happy to assist you further. Our email is support@publicdesire.co.uk.

settings.faq_title: I have received the wrong product
settings.faq_content: We are very sorry to hear about this, please can you send an email to our help team, with your name, address, order number and a picture of your item and our team will be happy to assist you further. Our email is support@publicdesire.co.uk.

settings.faq_title: I can't sign into my account
settings.faq_content: If you are unable to access your account, please check that you are using the correct email address and password to sign into your account. You can use the Forgotten password link to reset your password. If this does not help, please email us on support@publicdesire.co.uk.

settings.faq_title: I have not received a confirmation email
settings.faq_content: If you have not received a confirmation email, please check your spam/ trash folder and add us to your safe senders list. If you still cannot find the email, then email us on support@publicdesire.co.uk and we will resend this email to you.

settings.faq_title: My payment has been declined, why?
settings.faq_content: When entering your card details, please ensure that you enter the correct details including the Billing address. If your card is still being declined, it indicates your bank is rejecting the payment. If you contact them, they will be able to lift any block on the transaction and allow you to process the payment to complete your order. If you need further assistance, please email us on support@publicdesire.co.uk including your name, email address and type of card that you are using to place the order and we will help to get this resolved for you.

settings.faq_title: I am not receiving your newsletters
settings.faq_content: If you have signed up to receive our Newsletters and have not received them, they may be going to your spam/ trash folder. To correct this, please add mail@e-publicdesire.com to your address book or safe email list.

settings.faq_title: I'm a blogger, how can I work with Public Desire?
settings.faq_content: If you're a fashion blogger interested in working with us, please fill out the form here

settings.faq_title: I have a press / marketing enquiry
settings.faq_content: Any press or marketing enquiries can be submitted using the form here

settings.faq_title: How can I get in touch with you?
settings.faq_content: You can contact us by emailing us on support@publicdesire.co.uk. We aim to get back to you within 48 hours. If you prefer to write to us, you can do so by writing to Public Desire, Studio House, 40 Invar Road, Swinton, Manchester, M27 9HF.

settings.faq_title: Pre-Orders
settings.faq_content: If you place an order which includes an item on pre-order, please note your order won’t be shipped until the pre-order item arrives into stock and you will receive all items within your order in one shipment. Should you wish to receive any other items first, then you would need to process this in a separate order.

settings.faq_title: HOW DO I KNOW MY ORDER HAS COMPLETED
settings.faq_content: You will receive a confirmation email once your order has completed to the email provided. This may be in your spam/ trash folder, please check. Please make sure to check this is the correct email as we are unable to amend this once the order is completed.

settings.faq_title: CAN A DISCOUNT CODE BE ADDED IF I FORGET
settings.faq_content: Unfortunately, once the order has been placed, this can no longer be added. You can always use the code if still valid on your next purchase.

settings.faq_title: SOMETHING I PURCHASED IS NOW IN SALE. CAN I RECEIVE A PRICE ADJUSTMENT?
settings.faq_content: WE RUN REGULAR PROMOTIONS AND UNFORTUNATELY, DUE TO HIGH DEMAND FOR PRODUCT, IF YOU PURCHASE AN ITEM AND IT IS LATER REDUCED IN PRICE, WE CAN NOT MAKE ANY PRICE ADJUSTMENTS.

settings.faq_title: CAN I CHANGE/ CANCEL MY ORDER?
settings.faq_content: Once the order has been placed, unfortunately, we are unable to make any amendments as we try to process the order as quickly as we can. If you do need to make any changes, please contact our customer services team support@publicdesire.co.uk and we will try to assist although this cannot be guaranteed.

settings.tab_content:
You can certainly return your item for a refund, if it is unworn and in the original packaging and within 28 days from delivery to you. SADLY WE DON'T OFFER EXCHANGES AND THE ITEM CAN ONLY BE RETURNED FOR A REFUND.


Please ensure you include the returns form included in the parcel or if you did not receive a returns form, a covering letter with your order number and what you require on it.


PLEASE NOTE THAT WE DO NOT OFFER FREE RETURNS AND YOU WILL HAVE TO COVER THE RETURN POSTAGE COST.


Click the link below to start the return process

https://publicdesire.returns.international/


PLEASE RETAIN THE PROOF OF POSTAGE UNTIL YOU HAVE RECEIVED A REFUND INTO THE ACCOUNT USED TO MAKE THE PURCHASE


Please allow up to 10 working days for your return to be processed and an additional 5 working days for the refund to show in your account.

settings.main-text-info: PLEASE NOTE: Any returns considered as damaged/ dirty or worn will not be accepted as these need to be in a resalable condition and will be returned. Returns not received within the return policy timeframe will also not be accepted.

settings.delivery_price_info: Free on US orders when you spend over $90

settings.delivery_info: Please note: All delivery times are an estimate with the courier. Depending upon certain factors with their processes, this may slow or speed up the process and Public Desire cannot be held accountable.

settings.tab_content: 1.1. www.publicdesire.co.uk is a site operated by Public Desire Limited (“We”). We are registered in England and Wales under company number 6678204 and our VAT number is 939239389 Our email address is: support@publicdesire.co.uk
2.1. We accept orders from individuals in the UK, European Economic Area ("EEA") (the "Serviced Countries") and all other countries where possible (Including USA and Asia).

By placing an order through our site, you warrant that:

3.1.1. You are legally capable of entering into binding contracts;

3.1.2. You are at least 18 years old; and,

3.1.3. You are resident in one of the Serviced Countries.

settings.tab_title: 4. HOW THE CONTRACT IS FORMED BETWEEN YOU AND US
settings.tab_content:
4.1. After placing an order, you will receive an e-mail from us acknowledging that We have received your order. Please note that this does not mean that your order has been accepted. Your order constitutes an offer to us to buy a Product. All orders are subject to availability and acceptance by us, and We will confirm such acceptance to you by sending you an e-mail that confirms that the Product has been dispatched (the "Dispatch Confirmation"). The contract between us ("Contract") will only be formed when We send you the Dispatch Confirmation.

4.2. We will not process your order until payment has been received in full in accordance with the provisions of clause7.

4.3. If you make a mistake with your order, you may be able to correct any mistakes made by telephone prior to your order being processed. If your order has already been processed you will be unable to amend your order. If your order has already been dispatched, please return the Products to us in accordance with our Returns Policy.

4.4. The Contract will relate only to those Products whose dispatch We have confirmed in the Dispatch Confirmation. We will not be obliged to supply any other Products which may have been part of your order until the dispatch of such Products has been confirmed in a separate Dispatch Confirmation.

4.5. We are entitled to refuse any order made by you for any reason.

4.6. When making a request you undertake that all details you provide to us requesting goods or services are true and accurate, that you are an authorised user of the credit or debit card used to make your request and that there are sufficient funds to cover the cost of the goods and services. It is your responsibility to inform us of any changes to these details as soon as possible.

5.1. If you are contracting as a consumer, you may cancel a Contract at any time within seven days, beginning on the day after you received the Products. In this case, you will receive a full refund of the price paid for the Products in accordance with our Returns Policy.

6.1 Your order will be fulfilled by the delivery date set out in the Dispatch Confirmation or, if no delivery date is specified, then within 30 days of the date of the Dispatch Confirmation, unless there are exceptional circumstances.

6.2 If you place an order which includes an item on pre-order, please note your order won’t be shipped until the pre-order item arrives into stock and you will receive all items within your order in one shipment. Should you wish to receive any other items first, then you would need to process this in a separate order.

6.3 If you have not received your order within 8 working days of placing your order, please contact our Customer Service Team for us to be able to investigate the status with the carrier company. Please note that you have 30 days to contact us from the date of your order for us to be able to provide you with further information from the carrier company. If you contact us out of the 30 days period, the carrier will not be able to provide further information and we will not be able to offer a refund.

6.4 We aim to process orders as quickly as possible and for this reason, once you've placed an order with us, it cannot be cancelled or amended.

If an item(s) is no longer required please send the item(s) back to us in line with our returns policy

7.1. The price payable for the Products shall be as shown on the Website. Prices advertised on the Website include UK VAT but excludes delivery charges. Delivery charges are shown separately when ordering and must also be paid in advance.

7.2. Payment shall be made by you by the means specified on the Website and shall not be deemed to be made until We have received cleared funds in respect of the full amount stated in the order.

7.3. Prices are subject to change without notice but changes will not affect orders which We have already accepted.

7.4. Our site contains a large number of Products and it is always possible that, despite our best efforts, some of the Products listed on our site may be incorrectly priced. We will normally verify prices as part of our dispatch procedures so that, where a Product's correct price is less than our stated price, We will charge the lower amount when dispatching the Product to you. If a Product’s correct price is higher than the price stated on our site, We will normally, at our discretion, either contact you for instructions before dispatching the Product, or reject your order and notify you of such rejection.

7.5. We are under no obligation to provide the Product to you at the incorrect (lower) price, even after We have sent you a Dispatch Confirmation, if the pricing error is obvious and unmistakable and could have reasonably been recognised by you as a miss-pricing.

7.6. Payment for all Products must be by credit or debit card. We accept payment with VISA, VISA DEBIT, MASTERCARD, SOLO, MAESTRO and ELECTRON.7.7. The cost of foreign products and services may fluctuate. All prices advertised are subject to such changes.

7.7. In cooperation with Klarna Bank AB (publ), Sveavägen 46, 111 34 Stockholm, Sweden, we offer you the following payment options. Payment is to be made to Klarna: Pay Later.

Further information and Klarnas user terms you can find here. General information on Klarna you can find here. Your personal data is handled in accordance with applicable data protection law and in accordance with the information in Klarna's privacy statement.

7.8. Only one promotion code can be used per order.
8.1. For details on refunds, please refer to our Returns Policy.

9.1. If We do not deliver or if the Products We deliver are not what you ordered or are damaged or defective or the delivery is of an incorrect quantity, our only obligation will be, at our option to:9.1.1. make good any shortage or non-delivery or incorrect delivery; or

9.1.2. replace or repair any Products that are damaged or defective; or

9.1.3. refund to you the amount paid by you for the Products in question.

9.2. We shall have no liability to you for any consequential, special or indirect losses including without limit loss of revenues, profits, contracts, business or anticipated savings damage to or loss of goodwill, reputation or data.

9.3. Without prejudice to the foregoing, our total aggregate liability to you under and/or arising in relation to this contract shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the Products.

9.4. Nothing in this contract shall exclude or limit our liability for death or personal injury due to our negligence or any liability which is due to our fraud or any other liability which We are not permitted to exclude or limit as a matter of law.

9.5. Nothing in this contract shall exclude or limit your statutory rights.
All and any Intellectual Property Rights in connection with the Products shall be owned by Us absolutely.

Applicable laws require that some of the information or communications We send to you should be in writing. When using our site, you accept that communication with us will be mainly electronic. We will contact you by e-mail or provide you with information by posting notices on our website. For contractual purposes, you agree to this electronic means of communication and you acknowledge that all contracts, notices, information and other communications that We provide to you electronically comply with any legal requirement that such communications be in writing. This condition does not affect your statutory rights.

All notices given by you to us must be given to us at help.aus@publicdesire.co.uk We may give notice to you at either the e-mail or postal address you provide to us when placing an order, or in any of the ways specified in clause 13 above. Notice will be deemed received and properly served immediately when posted on our website, 24 hours after an e-mail is sent, or three days after the date of posting of any letter. In proving the service of any notice, it will be sufficient to prove, in the case of a letter, that such letter was properly addressed, stamped and placed in the post and, in the case of an e-mail, that such e-mail was sent to the specified e-mail address of the addressee.

13.1. The contract between you and us is binding on you and us and on our respective successors and assigns.

13.2. You may not transfer, assign, charge or otherwise dispose of a Contract, or any of your rights or obligations arising under it, without our prior written consent.

13.3. We may transfer, assign, charge, sub-contract or otherwise dispose of a Contract, or any of our rights or obligations arising under it, at any time during the term of the Contract.

14.1. We will not be liable or responsible for any failure to perform, or delay in performance of, any of our obligations under a Contract that is caused by events outside our reasonable control ("Force Majeure Event").

14.2. A Force Majeure Event includes any act, event, non-happening, omission or accident beyond our reasonable control and includes in particular (without limitation) the following:

14.2.1. Strikes, lock-outs or other industrial action.

14.2.2. Civil commotion, riot, invasion, terrorist attack or threat of terrorist attack, war (whether declared or not) or threat or preparation for war.

14.2.3. Fire, explosion, storm, flood, earthquake, subsidence, epidemic or other natural disaster.

14.2.4. Impossibility of the use of railways, shipping, aircraft, motor transport or other means of public or private transport.

14.2.5. Impossibility of the use of public or private telecommunications networks.

14.2.6. The acts, decrees, legislation, regulations or restrictions of any government.

14.3. Our performance under any Contract is deemed to be suspended for the period that the Force Majeure Event continues, and We will have an extension of time for performance for the duration of that period. We will use our reasonable endeavours to bring the Force Majeure Event to a close or to find a solution by which our obligations under the Contract may be performed despite the Force Majeure Event.

14.4. All delivery times are an estimate with the courier. Depending upon certain factors within their processes, this may alter the speed of delivery and Public Desire cannot be held accountable.

15.1. If We fail, at any time during the term of a Contract, to insist upon strict performance of any of your obligations under the Contract or any of these terms and conditions, or if we fail to exercise any of the rights or remedies to which we are entitled under the Contract, this shall not constitute a waiver of such rights or remedies and shall not relieve you from compliance with such obligations.

15.2. A waiver by us of any default shall not constitute a waiver of any subsequent default.

15.3. No waiver by us of any of these terms and conditions shall be effective unless it is expressly stated to be a waiver and is communicated to you in writing in accordance with clause 13 above.

16.1. If any of these terms and Conditions or any provisions of a Contract are determined by any competent authority to be invalid, unlawful or unenforceable to any extent, such term, condition or provision will to that extent be severed from the remaining terms, conditions and provisions which will continue to be valid to the fullest extent permitted by law.

16.2. Alternatively, you agree that the clause shall be rectified and interpreted in such a way that closely resembles the original meaning of the clause/sub-clause as is permitted by law.

17.1. These terms and conditions and any document expressly referred to in them represent the entire agreement between us in relation to the subject matter of the Contract and supersede any prior agreement, understanding or arrangement between us, whether oral or in writing.

17.2. We each acknowledge that, in entering into a Contract, neither of us has relied on any representation, undertaking or promise given by the other or be implied from anything said or written in negotiations between us prior to such Contract except as expressly stated in these terms and conditions.

17.3. Neither of us shall have any remedy in respect of any untrue statement made by the other, whether orally or in writing, prior to the date of any Contract (unless such untrue statement was made fraudulently) and the other party’s only remedy shall be for breach of contract as provided in these terms and conditions.

settings.tab_title: 18. OUR RIGHT TO VARY THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS
settings.tab_content:
18.1. We have the right to revise and amend these terms and conditions from time to time to reflect changes in market conditions affecting our business, changes in technology, changes in payment methods, changes in relevant laws and regulatory requirements and changes in our system's capabilities or for any other reason in our sole discretion which We may decide.

18.2. You will be subject to the policies and terms and conditions in force at the time that you order products from us, unless any change to those policies or these terms and conditions is required to be made by law or governmental authority (in which case it will apply to orders previously placed by you), or if We notify you of the change to those policies or these terms and conditions before We send you the Dispatch Confirmation (in which case We have the right to assume that you have accepted the change to the terms and conditions, unless you notify us to the contrary within seven working days of receipt by you of the Products).

These terms and conditions are to be construed in accordance with the laws of England and Wales and irrespective of your place of domicile, in the event of any dispute associated with these terms and conditions, that dispute shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the English Courts.

You can email us at support@publicdesire.co.uk or you can write to us at:

Public Desire
Studio House
40 Invar Road
Swinton
Manchester
M27 9HF

WE RUN REGULAR PROMOTIONS AND UNFORTUNATELY, DUE TO HIGH DEMAND FOR PRODUCT, IF YOU PURCHASE AN ITEM AND IT IS LATER REDUCED IN PRICE, WE CAN NOT MAKE ANY PRICE ADJUSTMENTS.

 

A) ALL DISCOUNT CODES EXCLUDE THE FINAL SALE CATEGORY UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED. ITEMS THAT ARE FINAL SALE ARE MARKED ON THE PRODUCT PAGE. NO DISCOUNT CODES CAN BE USED IN CONJUNCTION WITH ANY OTHER OFFER. DISCOUNT CODES CANNOT BE USED ON FLASH SALES.

B.) ALL STYLES ON PUBLIC DESIRE ARE UP TO 50% OFF, PRICES AS MARKED. PUBLIC DESIRE RESERVES THE RIGHT TO AMEND OR WITHDRAW PROMOTIONAL OFFERS AT ANY TIME. FROM TIME TO TIME PUBLIC DESIRE MAY OFFER FURTHER PROMOTIONAL CODES AND THESE CODES CAN BE USED ON ITEMS WITHIN THE NEW-IN CATEGORY. PROMOTIONAL CODES CAN NOT BE COMBINED AND THE MAX OF ONE CODE CAN BE APPLIED PER ORDER.ALL ITEMS FOUND IN THE SALE CATEGORY ARE FINAL SALE ITEMS AND NO FURTHER DISCOUNT CODES CAN BE APPLIED TO THIS ITEM. THIS IS STATED ON THE PRODUCT PAGE.

C.) THE 3 FOR 2 SLIPPER PROMOTION IS TO BUY ANY 3 PAIRS OF SLIPPERS FROM THE SLIPPER CATEGORY AND RECEIVE THE 3RD PAIR FOR FREE. SLIPPERS MUST BE PURCHASED AT THE SAME TIME AND THE CODE SLIPPERSEASON MUST BE APPLIED AT CHECKOUT.

IF YOU PLACE AN ORDER USING THE 3 FOR 2 CODE, AND THEN RETURN AN ITEM FROM YOUR ORDER, THEN THE TERMS OF THE CODE HAVE NO LONGER BEEN MET. THIS MAY MEAN THAT THE AMOUNT YOU'RE REFUNDED FOR THE RETURNED ITEM IS ADJUSTED OR COULD MEAN THAT NO REFUND WILL BE GIVEN. IF YOU RETURN 1 ITEM FROM THE ORDER, YOU WILL NOT RECEIVE A REFUND. IF YOU RETURN 2 ITEMS FOR YOUR ORDER, YOU WILL RECEIVE HALF OF YOUR REFUND AND IF YOU RETURN 3 ITEMS, YOU WILL RECEIVE A FULL REFUND.

OFFER IS VALID FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY AND CAN NOT BE USED IN CONJUNCTION WITH ANY OTHER OFFER OR PROMOTION.

D.) The buy 2 boots for $60 promotion is to buy any 2 pairs of boots from the boots spend and save category and receive the second pair of boots for $21.66. Boots must be purchased at the same time and the code SPENDANDSAVE must be applied at checkout.If you place an order using the SPENDANDSAVE code, and then return an item from your order, then the terms of the code have no longer been met. This may mean that the amount you're refunded for the returned item is adjusted or could mean that no refund will be given. If you return 1 item from the order, you will receive the refund for the discount amount. If you return 2 items for your order, you will receive a full refund.

E.) The code must be entered at the checkout to redeem. The code MEMORIAL20 allows the user to get an extra 20% off all items including sale items. The code is only valid once per customer. Offer subject to availability and Public Desire reserves the right to amend or withdraw promotional offers at any time. This code is only valid for customers shopping on our US store. Ends 8am (BST) Tuesday 31st May 2022.

F) Selected lines only and limited to the styles within the 25% off Summer Stylist Picks category. This offer is valid for a limited time only and can not be used in conjunction with any other offers or promotions. All styles within the category have already been reduced and no further discount can be applied at checkout. Offer subject to availability and Public Desire reserves the right to amend or withdraw promotional offers at any time.

G.)The code must be entered at the checkout to redeem. The code ROYAL allows the user to get an extra 20% off all items including sale items. The code does not work on the styles in the 25% off Summer Stylist picks category. Offer subject to availability and Public Desire reserves the right to amend or withdraw promotional offers at any time. Ends 8am (BST) Monday 6th June 2022.

H.)The code must be entered at the checkout to redeem. The code SUMMER20 allows the user to get an extra 20% off all items excluding sale items. Offer subject to availability and Public Desire reserves the right to amend or withdraw promotional offers at any time. Ends Friday 1st July 8am (BST)

S.)No discount codes valid on items from McLoughlin Girls Collection

T.)The code must be entered at the checkout to redeem. The code HURRY allows the user to get an extra 20% off all non-sale items for US customers only. Offer subject to availability and Public Desire reserves the right to amend or withdraw promotional offers at any time. Ends Saturday 23rd July, 8AM (BST)

S.)Only newsletter and SMS sign up codes are valid on items from Alabama Barker Collection
Student Discount is only applicable to UK, IE & US customers. Student Discount cannot be used on the Sale Category unless otherwise stated.

Instagram competitions:

a) Public Desire Instagram competitions and giveaways are open to anyone aged 12 and over and excludes employees of Public Desire Ltd, companies involved in the competition/prize draw and their associated, affiliated or subsidiary companies, their families, agents, or anyone connected with the competition/prize draw.

b) To enter Instagram giveaways, entrants must have access to the internet and have a Instagram account. Entrants must 'follow’ Public Desire on Instagram to be eligible for the competition.

c) Although Public Desire have provided images of the prizes in the competition, this can depend on subject of availability and similar alternatives may be given to the winner.

e) The winner will be drawn at random. Entries are only valid if the entry is completed correctly in accordance with the specific competition Terms and Conditions.

f) There is no limitation on the number of times an applicant can enter the competition

g) No purchase necessary, unless otherwise stated.

h) Competition closes when stated for the individual giveaway. Entries received after closure will not be counted.

i) The winner will be notified first through a private message, then the winner's name (at Public Desire's absolute and sole discretion) will be announced on the Public Desire's Instagram page and/or Twitter account.

j) In order to receive their prize, the winners are required to provide Public Desire with their full name, address and phone number.

k) All prizes are non-refundable and non-transferrable. All gift cards are valid for 1 year only and this will not be extended.

l) No cash alternative will be offered for any prizes.

m) When dates for claiming the prize are specified, they cannot be altered and by entering date-related competitions Public Desire or the third party are not liable in any way to any winner who cannot attend.

n) Failure to acknowledge receipt of their win, or provide full name and address, within 24 hours of receiving notice from Public Desire (or within claim period if specifically stated) will invalidate the winner.

o) Public Desire will not be liable for any delays in the receipt of entries and Public Desire does not accept responsibility for entries which are not received or delivered.

p) In the event that Public Desire believes that an entry contravenes these Terms and Conditions, it reserves all rights to delete the entry at its absolute and sole discretion.

q) These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by English law and the courts of England and Wales shall have exclusive jurisdiction. Public Desire reserves the right to amend the terms and conditions for this competition at any time without notice.

Win A Year's Supply Of Shoes Competition T&Cs:

1. ELIGIBILITY

1.1 This competition is open worldwide. Entrants must be over the age of 18.

1. ELIGIBILITY

Comment and tag your besties in the comments.

You can also share on Instagram Stories for an additional competition entry.

2.2 The end date will be shared on the Instagram post and the winner will be announced on this post.

2.3 By entering the competition, you are agreeing that if you are the winner your name will be posted publicly on the Public Desire Instagram account.

2.4 The competition will end on Thursday 4th March and the winner will be contacted via Instagram DM and announced on Instagram stories. 

3. PRIZE

3.1 The winner is entitled to a designer item of their choice up to the value of £1,000 (or the equivalent in their native currency). The prize is for 1 item and if the item is less than the value of £1,000 the remaining funds can not be redeemed. 

3.2 The winner must send a direct link of the item of their choice to the social media team and the product must be in stock when sending over. Public Desire will order this within 48 hours of receiving the link (excluding weekends) - if the product is not available, the winner must send a secondary alternative. 

3.3 The prize is non-transferable and there is no cash alternative 

3.4 There will be 1 winner announced and the details will be shared within the competition post. The winner will also be sent a Direct Message and will be required to share their full name, email address, shipping address and contact telephone number in order to receive the prize. 

3.5 Public Desire will be responsible for ordering the prize and the prize is not eligible for a refund or exchange.

ALL PRIZES ARE NON-REFUNDABLE AND NON-TRANSFERRABLE. NO CASH ALTERNATIVE WILL BE OFFERED FOR ANY PRIZES. THE GIFT CARD WILL BE VALID FOR ONE YEAR AFTER THE DATE OF ISSUE.

THE PRIZE:

Here at Public Desire we think it is very important you know your rights when it comes to browsing and buying online. You have several rights under the data privacy legislation. This includes, under certain circumstances, the right to:

request access to your personal datarequest correction of your personal datarequest erasure of your personal data (‘right to be forgotten’)request restriction of processing of your personal datarequest the transfer of your personal dataobject to processing of your personal dataobject to automated decision making

Brief details of each of these rights are set out below. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please email us at help.aus@publicdesire.co.uk.

settings.tab_title: Request access to your personal data
settings.tab_content: You have the right to obtain a copy of the personal data we hold about you and certain information relating to our processing of your personal data.

settings.tab_title: Request Correction of your personal data
settings.tab_content: You are entitled to have your personal data corrected if it is inaccurate or incomplete. You can update your personal data at any time by logging into your account and updating your details directly, or by emailing us at help.aus@publicdesire.co.uk.

settings.tab_title: Request erasure of your personal data
settings.tab_content: This enables you to request that Public Desire delete your personal data, where there is no good reason for us continuing to process it. Note, however, that we may not always be able to comply with your request of erasure for specific legal reasons which will be notified to you, if applicable, at the time of your request.

settings.tab_title: Request restriction of processing of your personal data
settings.tab_content: You have a right to ask Public Desire to suspend the processing of your personal data in certain scenarios, for example if you want us to establish the accuracy of the data, or you have objected to our use of your data but we need to verify whether we have overriding legitimate grounds to use it. Where processing is restricted, we are allowed to retain sufficient information about you to ensure that the restriction is respected in future.

settings.tab_title: Request the transfer of your personal data
settings.tab_content: You have the right to obtain a digital copy of your personal data or request the transfer of your personal data to another company. Please note though that this right only applies to automated data which you initially provided consent for us to use or where we used the data to perform a contract with you.

settings.tab_title: Object to processing of your personal data
settings.tab_content: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data where we believe we have a legitimate interest in processing it (as explained above). You also have the right to object to our processing of your personal data for direct marketing purposes. In some cases, we may demonstrate that we have compelling legitimate grounds to process your data which override your rights and freedoms.

settings.tab_title: Object to automated decision making and profiling
settings.tab_content:
You have the right to object to the automated processing of your personal data without human intervention. This form of processing is permitted where it is necessary as part of our contract with you, providing that appropriate safeguards are in place or your explicit consent has been obtained.

We will try to respond to all legitimate requests within one month. Occasionally, it may take us longer than a month if your request is particularly complex or you have made a number of requests. In this case, we will notify you and keep you updated. We may need to request specific information from you to help us confirm your identity and ensure your right to exercise any of the above rights. This is a security measure to ensure that personal data is not disclosed to any person who has no right to receive it.

If you have any concerns or complaints regarding the way in which we process your data, please email us directly at help.aus@publicdesire.co.uk. You also have the right to make a complaint to the ICO (the data protection regulator in the UK). We would, however, appreciate the chance to deal with your concerns before you approach the ICO, so please do contact us in the first instance.

We take the protection of your personal data seriously and will process your personal data fairly, lawfully and transparently. This privacy notice describes the personal data we are collecting about you and how it is used.

We will only collect and use your personal data for the following purposes, to:

fulfil your order(s)keep you up to date with the latest offers and trendsgive you a better shopping experiencehelp us to make our marketing more relevant to you and your interestsimprove our servicesmeet our legal responsibilities

settings.tab_title: How we keep your data safe and secure
settings.tab_content:
We have appropriate security measures in place to protect your data from being accidentally lost, used or accessed in an unauthorised way, altered or disclosed.

The communication between your browser and our website uses a secure encrypted connection wherever your personal data is involved. We encrypt your data and store it on secure servers hidden behind a firewall.

We require any third party who is contracted to process your personal data on our behalf to have security measures in place to protect your data and to treat such data in accordance with the law.

In the unfortunate event of a personal data breach, we will notify you and any applicable regulator when we are legally required to do so.

In order to be able to offer you Klarna’s payment options, we will pass to Klarna certain of your personal information, such as contact and order details, in order for Klarna to assess whether you qualify for their payment options and to tailor the payment options for you. General information on Klarna you can find here. Your personal data is handled in accordance with applicable data protection law and in accordance with the information in Klarna’s privacy policy.

If you can’t pay you can’t play, right? Wrong. With a Public Desire discount code, it doesn’t matter if payday’s still two weeks away or your student loan seems a distant memory. Whether you’re after some super sassy new heels for that must-not-miss party, a killer pair of stilettos or some fresh new creepers, we’ve got your back. So there’s no excuse not to shop it while it’s hot. Down for bagging a barg? Check our social channels for all our latest discount codes to save some hard-earned money next time you add to bag. Wanna be the sassiest gal on campus? Verify your student status with UNiDAYS to get 10% student discount.

Want seriously cool stuff in your inbox AND an extra 15% off your next order? We’ve got parties poppin’, offers droppin’, exclusive sales, fashion edits and epic competitions when you sign up to our newsletter, plus an exclusive discount to make your sign up a little sweeter!

settings.title: Public desire student discount
settings.description: Students save all year round at Public Desire with Youth Discount and UNiDAYS. We know the struggle is real when it comes to living your best life on a student budget, but with our discount schemes you can get the shoes you love for less! Simply enter your student discount code at the checkout to unlock discount off your order.

settings.cookie_description:
Google analytics cookie

This is used to collect information about how visitors use the Sites. The cookies collect information anonymously, including the number of visitors to the Sites, where visitors have come to the Sites from and the pages they have visited. We use this information to compile reports and to help us improve the Sites.

Amazon cookie

Amazon tracking and store widget cookies

PayPal cookie

When making a payment via PayPal these Cookie are issued - PayPal session/security

Get next day delivery for the entire year for
settings.delivery_terms:
To apply PD PASS to all orders for the next 12 months select VIPD PASS UNLIMITED NEXT WORKING DAY at checkout. The discount will be automatically applied at checkout for all future purchases for the next 12 months.

You will need a registered account to purchase.

settings.description: Pop your new faves into your basket and head to checkout as usual. You just need to be at least 18, a US resident and have a US debit or credit card.
No sign up or account is required! Simply select the Klarna option at checkout and select the pay in 4 instalments option.

Submit your order and you're good to go! Pay later in 4 instalments will allow you to spread the cost of your purchase over 4 equal instalments, interest free.
Please note, your credit score will be affected if you don't make your repayments to Klarna on time.

CREDIT IS ONLY AVAILABLE TO PERMANENT UK RESIDENTS AGED 18+, SUBJECT TO STATUS, T&CS APPLY. PLEASE NOTE PAY IN 4 INSTALMENTS IS NOT REGULATED BY THE FCA. PLEASE NOTE, KLARNA’S MAXIMUM APR OF INTEREST-BEARING PRODUCTS IS 28.99%. The ultimate babe Sarah always brings her SLAY game on insta, from street chic to glam out out fits, we are OBSESSED. Check out some of our favourite looks...

For our newest edition of Baewatch we caught up with mega-babe, Nyané Lebajoa. As well as being a model and influencer, she’s just launched her very first clothing brand. There isn’t anything that this bae can’t do or wear - she’s just so bad-ass! Just check out her IG for major hair and style inspo. You’ll be obsessed.

Tell us a little something about yourself? Hey, I'm Nyané and I'm an influencer and fashion designer.

What are you obsessing over at the moment? I'm obsessing over the Ultra Platforms! You will be seeing them a lot on my insta in the next days!

What is the nicest place you have visited? Good question - and hard to answer! Bali might be at the top of the list but I don't think you always have to go that far. I love Formentera and Santorini, obviously the visual aspect is very important for me!

Quick fire questions - go!

Coffee or Tea? Tea

Favourite word? OMG!

Instagram Stories or Snapchat? Insta Stories.

Winter or Summer? SUMMER!!!

settings.featured_description: The ultimate babe Sarah always brings her SLAY game on insta, from street chic to glam out out fits, we are OBSESSED. Check out some of our favourite looks...
We caught up with our girl Alyssa to get all the deets on how to create that perfect insta shot, her fav accounts and what PD style she's currently loving.

settings.featured_question: Give us an intro about yourself:
settings.featured_answer: I am a fashion & lifestyle blogger from southern California. I love styling outfits! I own a small business selling trendy hair accessories called Summer Buns & for fun I love to hang out at the beach. I love matcha, fresh flowers and a great pair of shoes.

settings.featured_question: When did you start Instagramming? Do you remember the first thing you posted?
settings.featured_answer:
I started blogging in the fall of 2018. I just decided one day to post an outfit pic and from that day on, that's what I still post.

It's definitely funny to look back on my feed and to see how far it's come.

settings.featured_description:
Neutral tones.

Casual chic.

Summer vibes.

settings.featured_question: Who would you say is your fave follower?
settings.featured_answer: I wouldn't say I have a favorite follower. I am seriously so grateful for my community that supports my content consistently and engages with me in my dms. I love chatting and building relationships and I've met some of my best friends from the app. But I can't pick just one fav ;)

settings.featured_question: What’s the most embarrassing thing you have done for the gram?
settings.featured_answer:
I don't think I've done anything too crazy. I used to be embarrassed to take photos in public but you quickly learn to not care what other people think.

Sometimes I'll do silly things like buy a prop for 1 photo but at this point I have no shame in my game.

settings.featured_question: Your fave outfit combo right now?
settings.featured_answer: I love a simple outfit with killer accessories. My go to is a crop top, a good pair of denim, air force 1s, gold statement jewelry, and my fav handbag.

settings.featured_question: What are you currently eyeing up from the PD site?
settings.featured_answer: I'm loving strappy sandals for summer. Currently obsessed with Cabo in blue.

settings.featured_description: Something that makes you happy & feel confident.

settings.featured_question: Who do you IG stalk?
settings.featured_answer: So many amazing babes... @lissyroddy @fashionismyfortee @sofiamcoelho @josefinehj @emmaleger @mvb @hannahschonberg @_kaesha this list goes on...

settings.featured_question: What apps/tools would you recommend for editing?
settings.featured_answer: Some of my favorite apps are lightroom, airbrush, touch retouch, VSCO and Kirakira

settings.featured_question: Tips on taking the best selfie?
settings.featured_answer: GOOD LIGHTING. This is so so important for a good selfie! Also - experiment with your angles and what works best for you. Practice makes perfect!

settings.featured_question: Do you use a filter and if so what is your fave to use?
settings.featured_answer: I used to use a very edited filter, but now I love natural lighting. I try to make sure the photo has good lighting and I'll tweak some of the colors and tone the exposure down a bit but I try to keep it natural looking.

settings.featured_description: We're totally crushing' on Californian bombshell Hodaya. Check out how she's styling' up her PD...

Comfort
Innovative
Stylish
Chic
Mature

settings.featured_question: Do you have any advice on how to nail that perfect pose?
settings.featured_answer: Yes, you have to find what works best for your body, example I have a rectangular shaped body so I always try to bend my body in ways that it will give the illusion of a waist, lol.

settings.featured_question: What inspires your fashion sense?
settings.featured_answer: I’ve always been inspired by Caribbean and NYC lifestyles.

settings.featured_title: What's your fave social media site?
settings.featured_description: Duhhhh, Instagram.

settings.featured_question: For the perfect Insta edit, do you have a go-to app/filter?
settings.featured_answer: Oh yes, I've always used VSCO, A4 it's my personal favourite.

settings.featured_question: What's up next for The Urban Gal, do you have any adventures planned?
settings.featured_answer: Adventures? Yes, always, I'm living the biggest adventure of my life. I never thought a blog that I created for my graduate program would get all the way here after 2 years.

settings.featured_description: The queen of festival chic stylin', Jill from Little Black Boots, knows how to work it when it comes to stripped back minimalist looks with a boho edge. Check out how she's styling Public Desire round LA for some serious style points and to keep that festival dreamin' alive.

settings.featured_question: What is your one wardrobe staple?
settings.featured_answer: Black leather jacket.

settings.featured_description:
Alexa Chung, Kate Bosworth
& anyone Monica Rose styles!

settings.featured_question: Current Insta-Crush?
settings.featured_answer: @monicarosestyle 'cos everyone she touches turns to gold!

settings.featured_title: Sum up  your style in 5 words?
settings.featured_description: Laid back, undone California girl.

We caught up with mega-babe, Nyané Lebajoa. As well as being a model and influencer, she’s just launched her very first clothing brand. There isn’t anything that this bae can’t do or wear - she’s just so bad-ass! Just check out her IG for major hair and style inspo. You’ll be obsessed.

settings.featured_question: Tell us a little something about yourself?
settings.featured_answer: Hey, I'm Nyané and I'm an influencer and fashion designer.

settings.featured_question: What are you obsessing over at the moment?
settings.featured_answer: I'm obsessing over platforms! You will be seeing them a lot on my insta in the next days!

settings.featured_question: What is the nicest place you have visited?
settings.featured_answer: Good question - and hard to answer! Bali might be at the top of the list but I don't think you always have to go that far. I love Formentera and Santorini, obviously the visual aspect is very important for me!

settings.featured_description:
Free.
Diverse.
Elegant.

settings.featured_question: What's next for Nyané Lebajoa?
settings.featured_answer: I will be rolling out lots of new business ideas over the next few months - watch this space girls!

settings.featured_question: Coffee or Tea? Summer or Winter? Saver or spender?
settings.featured_answer: Tea. Summer. Spender.

settings.featured_description: I have always wanted to design my own clothes and now I have my own clothing line!

Meet our latest girl crush and ultimate blogger bae, Erica from @fashionlush. If you're ever looking for that effortlessly cool outfit inspo - Erica's IG feed would be your go-to. She's a total boss when it comes to getting that perfect shot and knows how to slay a pair of booties like no other. We. are. shook!

settings.featured_question: Tell us a lil' about yourself, bae!
settings.featured_answer:
Hey guys! I am Erica Stolman. I have been blogging for 8 years & I love every second of it! I worked in corporate for a few years in the social media industry, but a 9-5 life was just not for me. I am not a morning person & I just needed something more creative for my life.


I currently live in San Diego with my boyfriend, our top model Frenchie (peep Ruby Tuesday on Instagram!), & our feisty 12 year old Yorkie. I also spend majority of my free time with my Mom, who is quickly becoming more of an internet sensation than I will ever be.

settings.featured_description:
Against.
The.
Grain.

settings.featured_question: Early bird or night owl? Phone call or text? Adventurous or cautious?
settings.featured_answer: Night owl. Text. Cautious.

settings.featured_question: Favourite colour combo? Pancakes or waffles? Sweat pants or jeans?
settings.featured_answer: Red and black. More of an eggs benedict kinda girl tbh. So torn, 50/50.

settings.featured_description: I am currently super into finding the newest Korean made photo editing apps, the Korean's are on top of the photo editing trends!

Meet our latest girl crush and PD Bae, Tori Wade. As a Sydney based dancer, Tori was named Aussie Dancer of the Year in 2014 and previously competed in Australia's Got Talent. As well as her fresh footwork, we're obsessing over her killer style and an insta full of #ootd inspo that slays.

settings.featured_title: Tell us about yourself in just three words.
settings.featured_description: Passionate, dedicated but chill.

settings.featured_question: We know you are extremely talented when it comes to dancing, how did that all start?
settings.featured_answer: I've been taking dance class since I can remember, shoutout to mom because I don't know what I'd do without dance.

settings.featured_question: How about your daily style, do you have a style icon?
settings.featured_answer: I have so many style icons that I would never be able to list them all! Being a dancer, my day-to-day style is super chill. I live for a pair of grey trackies and a grey singlet or any kind of matching set. Then there is also the super dressy side of me that I get out every now and then.

settings.featured_question: Coffee or tea? Braids or buns? Leather or denim?
settings.featured_answer: Coffee, braids, denim.

settings.featured_question: Winter or Summer? Call or text? Beyonce or Riri?
settings.featured_answer: Summer, text, RiRi.

settings.featured_description: I try my best to save, but online shopping sometimes gets in the way...
We followed Monikh's adventure around Madrid as part of our #TrailsOfDesire series, here’s how she strutted her stuff in the sassiest of PD shoes.
The queen of minimalistic styling; Monikh Dale needs no  introduction as one of our fave  blogger baes.

settings.featured_answer: "My holiday style was a little more colourful than my usual everyday minimal vibe. At the moment I’m obsessed with embroidery, metallics and textures - they're going to be big fashion hits this summer."

settings.featured_title: What did you do while in Madrid?
settings.featured_description: Ate, a lot!

settings.featured_question: 3 top tips when it comes to styling summer / holiday outfits...
settings.featured_answer:
1 - Pack items that can all mix and match. There’s nothing worse than lugging around a huge suitcase and not even wearing most of it.


2 - Check the weather before! But still always prepare.


3 - Always pack flat shoes. Realistically there’s going to be times when your feet are dying for those flat lace ups.

settings.how_it_work: Shop online and select Clearpay as your payment method to instantly create an account and complete your purchase. Your order will be shipped out straight away!
The cost will be split into 4 installments, taken automatically every 2 weeks. The first payment will be taken at the time of purchase.
No hidden costs! Pay nothing extra when you pay on time. The only fees are if you're late making a payment.

settings.message_under_hero_one: LOVE IT, GET IT, PAY IT IN FOUR.
settings.message_under_hero_two: Buy the shoes you want today and pay for it in four installments, interest-free with Clearpay.
settings.clearpay_info:
T&Cs:
Clearpay lends you a fixed amount of credit to allow you to pay for your purchase over 4 instalments, due every two weeks. To be eligible for credit from Clearpay, you must be a permanent UK resident (excl Channel Islands), aged 18+. Further eligibility criteria and T&Cs apply. Clearpay Finance Ltd. Make sure you can make your repayments on time by each due date to avoid late fees. Not paying on time will lead to a late fee of £6 and, if your order is worth more than £24, a further late fee of £6 if it is still overdue after 7 days. The total amount of late fees you may be charged will depend on your order value. If you fail to pay on time, your Clearpay debt may be passed to a debt collection agency and this may affect your ability to use Clearpay in future. We encourage you to use Clearpay responsibly
